title: Nendoroid 15-shuunen Anniversary PV

alternative_titles.ja: ねんどろいど15周年 Anniversary PV

synopsis:
February 2021 marks the 15th anniversary of the Nendoroid series! This video is to celebrate 15 years of Nendoroids! We hope you enjoy it!

A total of 20 characters from the "Nendoroid" series are featured in this stop motion video - showing the Nendoroids as they all come to life at night when everyone is asleep!

The film was produced by the stop-motion animation production studio Dwarf, which has produced a number of famous stop-motion works.

(Source: GOOD SMILE CHANNEL)
